JOB DESCRIPTION: JOB DESCRIPTIONWorks as part of the Business Transformation Team, controls and maintains a full-cycle software development process. He / She must be from technical background and knowledge in different domains of software development and integration, including coding, testing, documentation and methodologies for software development lifecycle.JOB REQUIREMENTS- Knowledge on Full Stack Application Development. - AWS or GCP or Microsoft Azure cloud knowledge.- Good in Database systems like database systems.- Masters/Bachelor s degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering is preferred - Deep understanding of programming languages like Python/Java.- Understanding with Docker/ Containers.- Knowledge with CI/CD Tools like Jenkins- Flexible to work in start-up eco-system- Understanding of best practices regarding system security and compliance measures - Enthusiastic to keep options open that fits companys core values - Aware of industry trends, optimizing performance, scalability, porting to other platforms- Consider existing enterprise architecture to make sure that new product fits well in the ecosystem - Application development stack - Python, Java, Visual Studio- Work closely with IT professionals within the company and project management team to successfully monitor progress of initiatives- Positive outlook in meeting challenges and working to a high level - Knowledge on AI/ML with Big data is good to have.
